name: Core Control (RedPen Games)
description:
You've been left alone to control Reactor 2 for the night shift, but can you keep it stable?

HOW TO PLAY

 - Use A & D to walk around

 - Use E to enter the reactor room

 - Use LMB to interact with buttons, valves and more

Note that this is not meant to try and simulate a nuclear reactor, all aspects are derived solely from media inspiration and creative design.
